So remembering how every is mean to you. You wish for the ability to morph and to swap body parts with other people at will with realty to change when you make a change. info.brief_description: One day before school you are granted one wish to be able to switch or modify body parts.
info.description:
Hello Everyone

Main Character - Sam (15), You are an unpopular high school student. You are unpopular mostly for being a nerd.
Kellie (45) Mom, Very kind and caring person. She loves you and your two sisters. She was also a supermodel when she was younger.
Ron (46) Dad, Works all the time tries too see his family when he can.
Amie (20) Older Sister, She is always mean to you and younger sister. She is in her second year of college and on the tennis team.
Julie (10) Younger Sister, She is always nice to you and your friends because you play with her whenever she wants. She is into barbies and Outer Space.

Any other characters are up to you to add.

This is the beginning of the story.

One day you are walking to school and you find a coin that reads on it good for one wish. So you wish for the ability to manipulate and to switch body parts at will with reality changing. Also you are the only one that knows how people really look like.

Other notes - Try not to swear to much in the additions please. Other than that any thing goes so be creative as passible.
